# Next steps
Here are some ideas:

* Try to upload different data sets and play with making different projection visuals
* Read the online [__tercen book__](https://tercen.github.io/tercen-book/)
* Give feedback on __tercen__ by sending an email to `info@tercen.com`
* Give feedback on this starters's guide by creating an [issue](https://github.com/tercen/starters-guide2/issues)
* [__Book a one-2-one session__](https://calendly.com/tercen-demo/tercen-demo) for further guidance
